short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ip 2 Location: is a Chrome extension that offers precise geo-location data for any IP address

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IP 2 Location is a Chrome extension that provides accurate geo-location data for any IP address. By simply entering an IP, users can retrieve details such as the country, region, city, and postal code, along with coordinates (latitude and longitude). The tool is useful for developers, security analysts, and marketers who need quick insights into where web traffic is originating. IP 2 Location simplifies the process by delivering detailed geographic information within the browser, making it an efficient solution for tracking and analyzing IP-based data.
